pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.3: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitvā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathenti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.5: rājakathaṃ corakathaṃ mahāmattakathaṃ senākathaṃ bhayakathaṃ yuddhakathaṃ annakathaṃ pānakathaṃ vatthakathaṃ sayanakathaṃ mālākathaṃ gandhakathaṃ ñātikathaṃ yānakathaṃ gāmakathaṃ nigamakathaṃ nagarakathaṃ janapadakathaṃ itthikathaṃ sūrakathaṃ visikhākathaṃ kumbhaṭṭhānakathaṃ pubbapetakathaṃ nānattakathaṃ lokakkhāyikaṃ samuddakkhāyikaṃ itibhavābhavakathaṃ iti vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.7: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitvā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathessanti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.9: itibhavābhavakathaṃ iti vā, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.10: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.11: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.12: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitvā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathessanti, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.15: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitvā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathetha, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.20: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitvā sabhāyaṃ nisīditvā anekavihitaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ kathessatha, seyyathidaṃ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.23: Netaṃ, moghapurisā, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.24: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.26: “Yo pana bhikkhu vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:1.1.27: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchantā sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagacchiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.6: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitun”ti kukkuccāyantā na pavisiṃsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.8: Atha kho te bhikkhū sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:2.1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu janapade sāvatthiṃ gacchanto sāyaṃ aññataraṃ gāmaṃ upagacchi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.6: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.8: Atha kho so bhikkhu sāvatthiṃ gantvā bhikkhūnaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.10: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.11: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, santaṃ bhikkhuṃ āpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.12: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.14: “Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:3.1.15: Evañcidaṃ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññataro bhikkhu ahinā daṭṭho hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.5: “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisitun”ti kukkuccāyanto na pāvisi … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.8: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tathārūpe accāyike karaṇīye santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.9: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:4.1.10: “Yo pana bhikkhu santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ paviseyya, aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.8: bhikkhu na sakkā hoti āpucchā pavisituṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.12: parikkhittassa gāmassa parikkhepaṃ atikkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.1.13: Aparikkhittassa gāmassa upacāraṃ okkamantassa āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.1: Vikāle vikālasaññī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā gāmaṃ pavisati, aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.2: Vikāle vematiko santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā gāmaṃ pavisati, aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc85:5.2.3: Vikāle kālasaññī santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā gāmaṃ pavisati, aññatra tathārūpā accāyikā karaṇīyā, āpatti pācittiyassa.
